TEXT.TITLE: OMNIBUS COMPUTER IN DEFAULT ON LINE OF CREDIT
TEXT.BODY: <Omnibus Computer Graphics Inc> said it is in default of certain credit provisions of its line of credit with its Canadian banker, resulting from a working capital beficit of eight mln dlrs. The company said it is currently negotiating additional financing to alleviate the problem. Reuter
